content: What is the tallest building in the world?

As of my last update in 2023, the tallest building in the world is the Burj Khalifa in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. It stands at an impressive height of 828 meters (2,717 feet) and has 163 floors. The Burj Khalifa was completed in 2010 and has held the title of the world's tallest building since its inauguration.
